reviews.customers_say: Customers find the shrug comfortable, lightweight, and perfect for dressing up summer tops, particularly noting it works well with sleeveless dresses. The fit is good, with one customer mentioning it hits at the hips/waist, and they appreciate its soft, silky fabric. The material thickness receives mixed feedback - while some find it appropriate for summer wear, others describe it as very thin.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice and stretchy, keeps arms covered
items.body: The media could not be loaded. The quality of fabric material is nice and stretchy, kind of see through but enough to keep your arms warm and covered. The style is nice and fit is perfect. It is not too thick but I like it this way to cover my shoulders and arms but still keep cool. The color is great and I’m very happy with my item. Read more
items.author: Jenny P

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very cute cardigan
items.body: This is super cute. The material is lightweight so it's great coverage for warmer days. It wasn't tight, kinda stretchy. There's no pulling in the fabric when you move your arms. The fabric moves with you. I'm considering more in different colors. Read more
items.author: Canterfly

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great Plus Size Lightweight Navy Shrug
items.body: This is a nice lightweight navy shrug. As you see in the photo it is very thin which was expected and perfect for Spring/Summer seasons. As a plus size woman it is often difficult to find sizes that work for me on Amazon. I was thrilled to receive this and find that it fits well. I use shrugs all the time and in every season. I mix and match to go over sleeveless dresses and pair with skirts and blouses, so many things. I have been looking for new shrugs in a variety of colors, at reasonable prices and Navy was at the top of the list. I’ve only worn it a couple of times but so far it is holding up very well, so I’m thrilled and may purchase more from this company soon. I laid order a size above because I knew I may wear it over blouses and dresses. I’m excited that I have room and could have probably ordered my usual size. Read more
items.author: Fearless Business Boss

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Nice sweater
items.body: I was so grateful I ordered this. I had ordered something already that looked cheap. This is a thin sweater, but it fit well+ looked nice. I always cover my batwings+ it was good in the air conditioning. I would definitely buy again. It is true to size. Read more
items.author: Edie

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice!
items.body: Beautiful, soft and very comfortable! Read more
items.author: Bobbie

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Washes and dries nicely
items.body: I love this shrug. It covers my large upper arms, is lightweight, washes and dries nicely and doesn't wrinkle after having it in my suitcase. I would order this again. Read more
items.author: Glenda McDaniel

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars nice but smell terrible
items.body: I love the style and quality. The problem is they have a horrible smell to them. I have washed them twice already and the smell is still there. Read more
items.author: leanne

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect
items.body: Perfect. Nice and soft and fits perfectly Read more
items.author: harley babe

short_description:
Womens Dress is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

Comfort comes from both the cut and the fabric, so selecting your preferred fit makes a noticeable difference over a full day of wear.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.

long_description:
Womens Dress is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: One Size.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: A07-royal Blue, A08-coffee, A04-khaki, A23-bright Yellow, A06-deep Forest, A12-green, A10-burgundy, A22-saddle Brown, A21-lake Blue, A05-red, A02-ivory White, A14-pink, A09-light Gray, A04-navy Blue. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
